me.tatarka.ipromise

Class Promise.Adapter<T,E extends java.lang.Exception>

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.tatarka.ipromise.Promise.Adapter<T,E>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the success result type
    E - the error result type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Promise.Listener<T,E>
    Enclosing class:
    Promise<T,E extends java.lang.Exception>

    public abstract static class Promise.Adapter<T,E extends java.lang.Exception>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Promise.Listener<T,E>
    This adapter is useful for when you only care about some of the possible result states or you want to split out the possible result states in separate methods. If you override result(Result), you must call super for the adapter to work correctly.
